Frog Detective: The Entire Mystery

By Worm Club

Featured: November 2023

Play or Learn More

You’re a detective, and a frog, and it’s time to solve 3 thrilling mysteries!

Play as the #2 best investigator as you find clues, question silly suspects, and look at things through your magnifying glass. Some nay-sayers have called the magnifying glass "useless", but what do they know?

About the Developer

Worm Club is a 2 person game dev team headquartered in Australia with Creative Director Grace Buxner & Design Director Thomas Bowker.

Connect with the Developer

Open Collective

Games Y'all is a meetup presented by The Museum of Human Achievement. We endeavor to celebrate, amplify, and support the unique and underrepresented within indie games and beyond.
